website_summaries.verdict: Although applying these eyeshadows takes a bit of skill, they are long-wearing and beautiful once applied.
pros: Neutral colors that are practical for any occasion, including everyday wear
Shadows feel soft on the skin and offer long wear
Can be used to highlight other areas of the face, such as cheekbones
A little color goes a long way
cons: Some customers complain of subpar applicators
Shades can appear too dark if applied with a heavy hand

customer_reviews.title: Sells high price, quality low.
customer_reviews.text: You know, anyone can bring out a line of cosmetics and put a fancy name to it, sell it for higher end prices, but that doesn’t make it higher end. This is no better then drug store shadows and in some cases not as good. I don’t recommend this product. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Texaslady

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Love this eye shadow! It goes on smooth and looks natural. I especially like the larger size of the neutral color which is surprisingly hard to find. Product is a bit expensive but, hopefully, will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel1

customer_reviews.title: JI can do no wrong!
customer_reviews.text: Ah, how I love her line! These are beautiful and help me, an inept cosmetician for only myself, face the day. So happy she makes beauty foolproof because I need all the help I can get! Love the quality, ease and natural product. The colors are soft and lovely and I don't care that it's small - never need much of her product anyway for a lovely result. Just so happy I discovered the line on a rosacea website! Bless her!
customer_reviews.author: dogmom

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeshadow Ive ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this same Daytime eye shadow kit since 2012 and I absolutely love it still. Feels good, looks natural, lasts all day, and I typically use 5 days a week and replace once per year. Cant go wrong with this kit!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Light Colors
customer_reviews.text: The eyeshadow shades are very light and don't leave much to see after being applied. The colors do look beautiful in the photo so I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: Only for Cool Skintones
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this product is great, but it does not work for warm skin tones. If you have a warm complexion, I think you are out of luck here. I have noticed this with many Jane Iredale products. Too bad, because they are nice!
customer_reviews.author: K. Grey

customer_reviews.title: Colors are awesome
customer_reviews.text: I don't love the applicators, but the colors are perfect. And the darkest one really isn't dark. Perfect for a very fair complextion.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for Size
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the small size of the Jane Iredale eye shadow kit. The colors were fine for a natural look, and the eye shadow did not irritate my sensitive eyes as some other brands do. However, for the amount of eye shadow included in the kit, I did not think it was a good value. Because it seems too expensive for the amount of product included, I will not purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Zepf

customer_reviews.title: Love Jane Iredale.
customer_reviews.text: Love Jane Iredale. I have been using this eyeshadow combo for years. It's the only brand my eyes will tolerate. It feels like velvet and applies smoothly with a great, beautiful final effect. There are JI tutorials on youtube on how to apply make-up on your eyes. Really helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Antonella

customer_reviews.title: Not blown away but nice to have
customer_reviews.text: This is an OK palette but not the wow-factor I was hoping for the price. The colors are nice but they don't wear well on my eyes (I have difficult lids though). I use the middle shade to contour which I really like, that's about all I use this for now. I occasionally use the 2nd lighter brown as a transition color and that looks nice. I would not recommend this to a friend because there are SO many natural shadows that I believe surpass this quality. It's not terrible, just not as good as I was hoping for with the high price tag.
customer_reviews.author: JandC.T

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love!!!!!! I love Jane Ireland! The product is amazing! You really get what you pay for here. The pigment is beautiful!!! Oh I just love it!!! I love that you really don’t need very much on your brush and the color choices are a great combination! I would highly recommend this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle & Jane

customer_reviews.title: Love this palette
customer_reviews.text: I love Jane Iredale and this palette is just another win in my opinion. Love the colors and the cute case they come in.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Jane Iredale products and this is a nice combination of colors for everyday use!
customer_reviews.author: Beth23

customer_reviews.title: Applies smoothly
customer_reviews.text: Really like the shaadows and how smoothly it goes on. I don’t wear a lot of makeup up so the palate is perfect for me. Seems a bit pricey for what you get (and I won’t use all the shades), although the compact is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: this product I really like because it glides on nicely and stays put
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't review makeup because I always thought that all makeup is the same. Though, this product I really like because it glides on nicely and stays put. The case is a nice feature too.
customer_reviews.author: Ms  Bulldog

customer_reviews.title: Good daytime eye makeup
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time I have ordered this product. Great daytime eyewear..
customer_reviews.author: pensiongal

customer_reviews.title: Very sad about that as the shadows were smooth and easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it a 5 stars but 2 colors irritated my eyes. Very sad about that as the shadows were smooth and easy to apply. I would recommend to others other than the grey abs brown colors.
customer_reviews.author: Redhead

customer_reviews.title: the taupe is really the only good color.
customer_reviews.text: This color combo is fair. The light isn’t light enough to use as a highlighter, the taupe is really the only good color.
customer_reviews.author: BellaLou

customer_reviews.title: I love the Jane Iredale products
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for my daughters for Christmas. I love the Jane Iredale products. It's nice that she offers these natural eyeshadow colors in Matte. Her make up is so great especially if you're having a lot of pictures taken. It reacts well under lights.
customer_reviews.author: Carol J Young

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: It does fade quicker than regular eye shadows but it looks beautiful. It’s nice knowing I can look nice without putting chemicals on my face. I also have oily skin so it may not fade on skin that isn’t oily
customer_reviews.author: Laura Mangham

customer_reviews.title: Eyeshadow kit
customer_reviews.text: This defiantly is awesome makeuplasts all day and eyeshadow doesn’t crease the eyeshadow.
customer_reviews.author: hourik markanian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent eyeshadows  Beautifully crafted case
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cosmetic case perfect size thin case for your purse with the mirror and the product Is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Great to apply; no skin irritation; no need for touch-up throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Reader100

customer_reviews.title: Great for daytime!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this eye shadow kit for daytime! It goes on easily and stays on well. It feels good on the skin. The colors are exactly as shown and are very complimentary together.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors and product. Goes on smooth lasts all day and very happy with the natural look. Would buy it again and certainly recommend it to anyone contemplating purchasing this.
customer_reviews.author: NE

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love these colors and the way it stays on all day!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: goes on easy,
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time using. Lasts a long time, goes on easy,
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, high quality eye shadows!
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of these colors and the long wearing aspect!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Hall

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed- for the price- no color pay off, even used 'wet', does not saturate the intended area with color. Have used with eye primer, no difference in the quality of this shadow. Also, a 'negative'= it is supposed to be for daytime/"matte" BUT, indeed, the lighter shades do have 'shimmer'. Bummer. Brush included is useless(too long and porous for eye application-I used my own professional grade brushes)-Case is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good choice.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Colors blend well. The matt colors are complementary. No creasing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great colors so many looks you can do with this kit. Cheryl
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it one time. I applied it in the evening with make up brushes. I always use eye primer under my eye make up. Have not had the opportunity to use for an entire day. Have always believed in this company. The colors are very nice and subtle and easy to pack for travel.
customer_reviews.author: BTD

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Four stars due to its price, but I do love JI products!
customer_reviews.author: MJL

customer_reviews.title: I love the remaining shadows and colors
customer_reviews.text: The white shadow arrived crushed, it was packed with a heavy bottle... However, I love the remaining shadows and colors.
customer_reviews.author: Bronwyn

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for so much more. Creases, fades, poor pigment color. Cheap brush. Extremely dissatisfied. Wanting natural, organic products but not antibg to be deceived or spend hard earned money on such a poor product. Would never recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Helen L. Reba

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful natural look
customer_reviews.text: This makeup is a bit pricey but it goes on smoothe and looks very natural. The brush that comes with it is pretty useless. 4 stats for the eyeshadow, minus one star for price and useless brush.
customer_reviews.author: L. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great colors
customer_reviews.text: I have been switching to all natural/chemical free products for health reasons. I love the colors and I do not have to touch up during the day!
customer_reviews.author: jnarice

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: this is a great deal on this item! this makeup sells for at least $15 dollars more in the store!
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Jane Iredale Eye Shadow
customer_reviews.text: Great kit. Nice colors & coverage. Would rather have 3 larger colors vs 5 smaller ones or be able to custom order a kit. All in all, very satisfied. Super fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Leahy

product_meta.title: jane iredale Eye Shadow Kit
product_meta.description:
Color:DaytimeDaytime eye shadow kit 0.32 ounce. Our highly pigmented shadows are simple to blend, sensitivity tested and they stay put for gorgeous, crease free, long lasting eye color.

BRAND STORY
jane iredale is a comprehensive line of mineral makeup developed to enhance the lives of women by delivering personal, natural beauty to lift her health and spirit.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
